common_issues.title: Onboarding Issues in Pieces Desktop Application
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with the onboarding process in the Pieces desktop app, including blank chat history, failure to generate demo chats and pieces, and 'Context Exceeded' errors. These problems seem to persist even after restarting the app or deleting local data. Proposed solutions involve investigating the root cause and potential fixes in upcoming releases.

related_issues.title: Demo Chat are stuck loading
related_issues.text:
Demo Chat are stuck loading
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

10.1.15

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I set up a demo instance of pieces in a VM to test a bug report, for that purpose I skipped the onboarding completely, since then the demo chats are loading:

related_issues.text:
Personalizing during installation broken on macOS 12.7.6
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

3.2.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After installing, I get a screen to personalize my experience, but there's no way to continue after that:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1aa336e7-b02d-4b6c-8bcc-899cd4dc9679)

**Key Points Raised:**

* The issue is likely caused by an interface bug that cuts off the "next" button on smaller screens (e.g., 11" Macbook Air).
* This prevents users from progressing through the onboarding process.

**Problems Identified:**

* Interface doesn't account for smaller screen sizes.
* No way to resize the window during onboarding.

**Proposed/Implemented Solutions:**

* Ensure the onboarding window is resizable in the next release.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue has been confirmed and acknowledged as a duplicate of #470.
* The next release will include a fix for the window resizing issue.
* The user is requested to provide their system display size and resolution.

**Additional Notes:**

* The user was able to work around the issue by tabbing and using luck to reach the "next" button.
* This issue is likely resolved, pending the next release.

* Releasing a new version (3.1.0) of the app with performance improvements.

* The developer has invited users experiencing the issue to schedule a live troubleshooting session.

**Key Points:**

* The white screen issue is affecting the usability of the Pieces Desktop App.
* The exact cause of the issue is unknown.
* The developer is actively working on a solution.
* Users experiencing the issue are encouraged to contact the developer for troubleshooting.

Pieces for Developers app keeps crashing continuously on attempts to upload files and folder and needs restart on my windows 11 laptop
## GitHub Issue Summary: Files/Folders as Context 

**Key Points:**

* @omkar-4 reported an issue with using files/folders as context in Pieces.
* @mark-at-pieces acknowledged the issue and highlighted its tricky nature due to unreproducibility with current test cases.

**Proposed Solutions:**

* @mark-at-pieces requested @omkar-4 to share the specific files/folders used with the Pieces Copilot for reproduction and analysis.

**Current Status:**

* Awaiting @omkar-4's response with the requested files/folders.

**Next Steps:**

* Once received, @mark-at-pieces will attempt to reproduce the issue and identify the root cause.
* A solution or workaround will be proposed based on the findings.

recommendations: **Prioritize Onboarding Issues:** The most frequent and active tickets revolve around onboarding problems across macOS and the desktop app. Focus on resolving these issues to ensure a smooth initial user experience.

**Investigate and Fix Copilot Errors:** Many users report issues with Pieces OS Copilot, including display glitches and "Context exceeded" errors. Address these problems to improve Copilot's reliability and functionality.
**Address Windows Desktop App Problems:** Users experience white screens and crashes on the Windows desktop app. Prioritize resolving these issues to ensure stability and functionality on Windows.

**Improve Error Messaging:** Vague error messages like "Something went wrong with processing" frustrate users. Provide more specific error messages to help users understand and potentially resolve issues themselves.
**Gather More Information on Tricky Issues:** For issues like file/folder uploads causing crashes, request specific files/folders from users to reproduce and debug effectively.

**Consider User Interface Improvements:** Issues related to window resizing and button visibility on smaller screens highlight the need for UI improvements to accommodate various screen sizes and resolutions.
**Review and Update Documentation:** Ensure that documentation and support resources are up-to-date, especially regarding onboarding, Copilot usage, and troubleshooting common errors.
**Monitor and Analyze Ticket Trends:** Regularly analyze support ticket data to identify recurring issues, emerging trends, and areas for improvement in the software or support processes.
